title: Day 24: Lake Louise - Climbing and R&R — Canmore, Canada
content:
Day 24: Lake Louise - Climbing and R&R - Canmore, Canada 
   Canmore, Canada 

Today was a 'stay in place' day here in Canmore. Frank and Rita biked around the trails of town while Deb and Bryan drove to Lake Louise for a day of climbing at the back of the lake. 
 
A good day altogether and capped off with a nice dinner and pretty sunset.
source: TravelPod.com TravelStream™ — Recent Entries at TravelPod.com
